ActCorrections and Conditional Release Act
PrecisOrder fixing the remuneration and certain conditions of employment of AMY AGAR, full-time member of the Prairie Regional Division of the Parole Board of Canada, for the period she is acting as Vice-Chairperson of the Prairie Regional Division, effective October 19, 2020, until such time as she is no longer required to act as Vice-Chairperson of the Prairie Regional Division.
